Hello!

I'm Kasey Bonifacio and I have been building things on the Internet since 2011. I have a diverse background in design, frontend development, and backend development—but the frontend is where my ❤️ is. In 2015 I joined the folks at Sparkbox and have focused my career on building accessible websites and usable design systems.

I have a passion for teaching others and helped create the Girls Can Code workshop, later reorganizing the curriculum for a wider audience via a Library Workshop.
